name: The Infection (PhantomGR211)
description:
After a  mysterious virous broke out most of the civilazition died. Only few people remain.

You need to find food, water and a shelter for the night. 

Will you be able to survive and wake up to fight another day?

Hello everyone this is my first game jam and my first "real" game. If you have any tips of how i could improve please comment bellow.
